resources.string: Set the users data, you will need to calculate the body fat rate
The male is "male" and the female is "female"
The unit is cm, the range is 40~240cm
Only support children under 10 years old and under 80 years old. For those under 10 years old, only body weight and BMI data are valid.

When "First Time" is selected, each device will only return once in a single scan. When "Every time" is selected, each device may be called back multiple times in a single scan, but the signal strength will be different.

kg The default value of kilograms is 
 lb. All scales can support this unit
 kg. If the scale end does not support it, it will display kg
st.英石,如果秤端不支持会显示lb
Your age is less than 10 years old, you cant get accurate measurement data when testing
After setting the time, no Bluetooth device will be scanned within the specified time, and the error message will be recalled.

Scan duration, in ms, defaults to 0, that is, scans all the time, unless the APP calls stopBleDeviceDiscovery. If it is not 0, the minimum value is 3000ms, the delay will automatically stop after the duration ms time.

string-array.name: user_goal_des
string-array.item: Strength exercises, such as equipment exercises, several times a week
Good foundation, but lack of systematic training
Aerobic exercise several times a week, such as running
